tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    data_size INT,
    threat_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  source_ip VARCHAR,
  destination_ip VARCHAR,
  data_transferred INT
);

CREATE TABLE system_status (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  cpu_usage FLOAT,
  memory_usage FLOAT,
  disk_usage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    port INT,
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    threat_level VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE system_status (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    server_name VARCHAR(255),
    cpu_usage FLOAT,
    memory_usage FLOAT,
    disk_usage FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE security_threats (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_type VARCHAR(50),
    threat_description TEXT,
    threat_status VARCHAR(20),
    detection_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkTraffic (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    port INT,
    protocol VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkTraffic (ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
SourceAddress VARCHAR(255),
DestinationAddress VARCHAR(255),
Timestamp TIMESTAMP,
Protocol VARCHAR(50),
Status VARCHAR(50))

CREATE TABLE SystemStatus (ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
Hostname VARCHAR(255),
Timestamp TIMESTAMP,
CPUUsage DECIMAL(5,2),
MemoryUsage DECIMAL(10,2))

CREATE TABLE SecurityThreats (ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
ThreatName VARCHAR(100),
Severity VARCHAR(50),
ThreatType VARCHAR(50),
Description TEXT,
Status VARCHAR(50))

CREATE TABLE Alerts (ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
AlertType VARCHAR(50),
SourceID INT,
DestinationID INT,
Timestamp TIMESTAMP,
Details TEXT)

CREATE TABLE Users (ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
Username VARCHAR(50),
Email VARCHAR(255),
Role VARCHAR(50))
